title: Ghosts - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 4/27/20
itunes:title: Ghosts - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 4/27/20
description:
George Noory and paranormal investigator Steve Gonsalves of the TV show "Ghost Nation" discuss what got him to leave a career as a police officer and become a ghost hunter, some of the strangest cases he has been involved in and whether he thinks the afterlife is real.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
